summary: I really like RWBY Avengers AUs:
body:
I really like RWBY Avengers AUs:

Jaune: “Go! GO! Get in the building.”

The blond pushed Whitley Schnee into an abandoned building, which was shaking like mad from the vibrations of the kingdom of Atlas rising into the stratosphere.

Whitley: *gasping in shock, near a panic attack* “damnit, damnit, damnit… this is all my fault… all my fault…!”

Jaune: “Hey… HEY!” He roughly shakes Whitley until the Schnee looks at him. “Look, it’s all your fault, it’s everyone’s fault, who cares?”

Whitley: “You don’t understand! If I hadn’t messed with Watts’ mind, with the little control I had over my abilities-!”

Jaune: “Who cares?! Are you up for this?! Are you?! Look, I just need to know because, well, the kingdom is flying… The kingdom is flying, okay?! The kingdom is flying, we’re fighting a bunch of rogue robots and Grimm… and I have a plain sword and shield. None of this makes sense!”

Both of them flinch as the wall shakes from an explosion outside.

Jaune: “But still… I’m going out there… because it’s my job. Okay? And I can’t do my job and babysit. It doesn’t matter what you did, or what you were… if you go out there, you fight, and you fight to kill…! You stay in here, you’re good; I’ll send one of your sisters to come find you, but if you step out that door…”

Jaune stands, extending his sword.

“You’re a Huntsman.”

title: Unwanted
body:
Loki doesn’t want to have kids.

Unwanted

You weren’t sure what to do.After postponing it for weeks, you finally got a pregnancy test.The signs had been obvious for days, but you just kept ignoring them. You had gone to great lengths to…

Read more…

summary: everyone’s focusing on Steve being in group therapy “Bc of losing Bucky again” but like,,, y’all,,, he lost the rest of his...
body:
everyone’s focusing on Steve being in group therapy “Bc of losing Bucky again” but like,,, y’all,,, he lost the rest of his friends too they all lost their friends

I like to think the others are there with him Bc no regular civilian can really relate to how much pain and guilt they must all feel??? And they’re trying to get Steve to open up Bc “god Steve we know how much it hurts just let us in so we can all get better”

a broken team who blame themselves for not being able to save the world

a broken team who never found tony

a team that misses his dumb snarky comments Bc he cared so much and never showed how much he hurt

they’re all gone and they’re left to pick up the pieces after they lose the battle

they face backlash and hate Bc “you’re the avengers why couldn’t you stop them”

and no one else understands how much they must be hurting too Bc half the universe is GONE and everyone is afraid and hurting that they need someone to blame

tldr;; let the avengers grieve together gOD let them fall apart and grieve for the relationships that they never thought they would lose so quickly let them be mad at themselves let them be hurt let them be more than fighters for just a moment

summary: Look...some nights you just lay awake remembering Pietro Maximoff and how they did him dirty. Don’t fight it. You gotta ride it...
body:
Look…some nights you just lay awake remembering Pietro Maximoff and how they did him dirty. Don’t fight it. You gotta ride it out.

Also just remembering #pietrolives. *sigh* Endgame tho?😬…and the cycle begins again.
